name: CrcTumourStageN
description: Lists the options for Colorectal cancer tumour stage N

concept.display: pN1: Metastasis in 1 to 3 regional lymph nodes (colon/rectum)
N2: Metastasis in 4 or more lymph nodes

contains.display: pN1: Metastasis in 1 to 3 regional lymph nodes (colon/rectum)
N2: Metastasis in 4 or more lymph nodes
NX Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed
N0 No regional lymph node metastasis
N1a Metastasis in one regional lymph node
N1b Metastasis in 2-3 regional lymph nodes
N1c Tumour deposit(s) in the subserosa, mesentery, or nonperitonealised pericolic or perirectal tissues without regional nodal metastasis
N2a Metastasis in 4-6 regional lymph nodes
N2b Metastasis in 7 or more regional lymph nodes
